Website Designer

Rubén Gutierrez

Hello, my name is Rubén Gutierrez and I am a Website Developer from La Habra, California. I've been building website for a while now and I am profoundly passionate about using technology to help others do what they really want to do.

How I Got Started Working With Computers & Website

My interest with technology started when I received my first computer for Christmas when I was around ten years old. After taking my new computer apart and putting it back together a dozen times I learned enough about them to start doing IT work for my friends and family. After computer repair I moved on to coding and now I focus on website development and online marketing.

Technologies I'm Familiar With

For me technology is a constantly changing field that requires you to quickly learn new skills to adapt and overcome different obstacle. With that said I also think it's important to let people know some of the exact tools you're familiar with in order to help them gauge you're understanding and whether you can help them.

HTML

The foundation of the internet but really HTML has given me the ability to turn my simple ideas into something tangible. HTML allows me to present my creativity in ways that social media and other platforms just can't match. It still baffles me to think that this seemingly simple markup language has the capacity to provide soo much assistance in the forms of tools and information for anyone throughout the world.

Static Site Generators

Static site generator like Jekyll & 11ty have not only made it easier for me to maintain larger and more complex projects but it's also helped me learn the ins and outs of front end design. t easier to maintain my projects at scale. These have brought about an effiecienty and order into my life almost absolutely free. Tools like Jekyll and 11ty

WordPress

One of these most valuable skills I've learned as a freelance website developer has been WordPress.

Ruben Gutierrez
